headline: Europe Unveils SAIX Initiative as Digital Iron Curtain Descends
body: As 2025 marks the definitive end of the global digital frontier, the geopolitical landscape has fractured into isolated silos. Washington and Beijing have completed their respective walls of code, effectively decoupling the internet. In response, the European Union has established the Sovereign Artificial Intelligence and Information Exchange (SAIX). With a mandate to achieve full technological independence within five years, the newly appointed Director faces a daunting task: constructing a world-class infrastructure from the ground up under extreme budgetary constraints. The project represents Europe's final attempt to maintain sovereignty in a world where data is the ultimate weapon. All eyes now turn to Brussels as the first phase of construction begins.
flavor: The mandate is clear: bridge the gap or disappear from the map.
